keyword: calories in a coffee mate creamer
title: Calories in a Coffee Mate Creamer
meta_description: Discover calories in a coffee mate creamer serving, including fat, carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per tablespoon.
h1: Calories in a Coffee Mate Creamer
assumptions: Original liquid Coffee-Mate non-dairy creamer, per 1 tablespoon (15 ml) serving; no flavor additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, type (liquid vs. powder), brand batch, and serving size. Check product label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of Coffee-Mate creamer contains about 35 calories, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts panel for easy label comparison.

tweaks.label: Use vanilla flavored instead of original
Opt for powdered creamer (1 tsp equivalent)

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of Coffee Mate creamer?
faqs.a: About 35 calories per tablespoon of original liquid Coffee-Mate.

faqs.q: Is Coffee Mate creamer low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, only 1 g carbs per tablespoon, with 1 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: What are the fats in Coffee Mate creamer?
faqs.a: 3 g total fat per tablespoon, including 0.5 g saturated fat and 0 g trans fat.
No protein (0 g) in original Coffee-Mate creamer per serving.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Coffee Mate?
faqs.a: Flavored versions like hazelnut may add 5â€“10 calories per tablespoon due to extra sugars.
